footer.content: UN Sustainable Development Goals Project - Web-Based Programming Group C3

content.title: About this website
content.intro: Welcome to our site, dedicated to raising awareness and understanding for three of the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals: Clean Water and Sanitation, Goal 6; Responsible Consumption and Production, Goal 12; and Climate Action, Goal 13.
content.goal6: Water, sanitation and hygiene are basic requirements for health, dignity, and sustainable development. Goal 6 is to ensure all people have access to sufficient, safe, and affordable drinking water, with adequate and equitable access to sanitation.
content.goal12: Goal 12 deals with ensuring production is sustainable with respect to consumption, reducing waste, preserving resources, and protection of the environment.
content.goal13: Climate change is currently one of the most important threats to the environmentand human health in every continent. Goal 13 calls for urgent action both at the national levels and internationally that will help to reduce the effects of climate change.
content.outro: Click on the images on the right side of the page to find out more about each of the goals.
